Detailed Description

This class is used to represent a blob data type.

It is similar to the string data type but writes itself differently to sections.

This method adds this object to the input MD5 object.

Reimplemented from StringDataType.

virtual bool BlobDataType::addToSection ( PyObject *  pNewValue,
DataSectionPtr  pSection 
) const [inline, virtual]

This method adds the value of the appropriate type into the input data section.

The value can be assumed to have been created by this class or to have (previously) passed the isSameType check.

Parameters:
pValue The value to add.
pSection The data section to add the value to.
Returns:
true if succeeded, false otherwise. In the failure case, the section is generally clobbered, and should be discarded.

Reimplemented from StringDataType.

Overrides the DataType method.

See also:

Reimplemented from StringDataType.

virtual bool BlobDataType::fromSectionToStream ( DataSectionPtr  pSection,
BinaryOStream &  stream,
bool  isPersistentOnly 
) const [inline, virtual]

This method reads this data type from a data section and adds it to a stream.

The default implementation uses createFromSection then addToStream. DEPRECATED

Parameters:
pSection The section to read from.
stream The stream to write to.
isPersistentOnly Indicates whether only persistent data should be considered.
Returns:
true for success

Reimplemented from StringDataType.

DataSectionPtr  pSection,
bool  isPersistentOnly

This method reads this data type from a stream and adds it to a data section.

The default implementation uses createFromStream then addToSection. DEPRECATED
